body.prompt:
Generate a fake conversation between a customer and an agent.
The agent should introduce themselves, their company and give the customer
their name. The agent should ask for the customer's name.
As part of the conversation, have the agent ask for two pieces of
personal information.  Spell out numbers. For example, 1000 should be
said as one zero zero zero, not one thousand. The conversation should be
at least 10 lines long and be complete. At the end
of the conversation, the agent should thank the customer for their time
and end the conversation. Return the conversation formatted 
like the following example:

{'conversation': 
    [
    {'speaker': 'Agent', 'message': 'xxxxx'}, 
    {'speaker': 'Customer', 'message': "xxxxx."}, 
    {'speaker': 'Agent', 'message': "xxxxxx"}
    ] 
}

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Hello, thank you for contacting our customer support. My name is Scott Brown and I represent XYZ Motors. May I please have your name?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Hello, my name is Michelle Watson.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Thank you, Michelle. To assist you, can you please provide me with your phone number, spelled out digit by digit?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Sure. Four seven nine, five five five, one two three four.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Thank you. And could you also provide me with your email address, with each character spelled out?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Of course. M as in Mike, i as in India, c as in Charlie, h as in Hotel, e as in Echo, l as in Lima, l as in Lima, e as in Echo, w as in Whiskey, @, g as in Golf, m as in Mike, a as in Alpha, i as in India, l as in Lima, .com

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Thank you for providing that information, Michelle. We will look into your request and get back to you as soon as possible. Is there anything else I can assist you with today?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: No, that should be all. Thank you for your help.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: You're welcome, Michelle. Thank you for contacting XYZ Motors. If you have any further questions, feel free to reach out. Have a great day!
